name: SUDOKU
synopsis: SUDOKU offers hundreds of number-crunching puzzles that will stretch your brain power to the limit! Play in the exclusive Newspaper Mode. Add puzzles from your favourite newspapers and start your own collection! SUDOKU features a host of grid designs, stat tracking and an in-game timer to test your reaction time. Play on 5 different levels from Easy to Insane. This addictive game has been polished to perfection and renders a sleek design that’s easy on the eyes. SUDOKU. It’s the logical choice!
